mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from c_cons
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into c_cons (CONS_ID, CUST_ID, CONS_NO, CONS_NAME, CUST_QUERY_NO, TMP_PAY_RELA_NO, ORGN_CONS_NO, CONS_SORT_CODE, ELEC_ADDR, TRADE_CODE, ELEC_TYPE_CODE, CONTRACT_CAP, RUN_CAP, SHIFT_NO, LODE_ATTR_CODE, VOLT_CODE, HEC_INDUSTRY_CODE, HOLIDAY, BUILD_DATE, PS_DATE, DUE_DATE, NOTIFY_MODE, SETTLE_MODE, STATUS_CODE, ORG_NO, RRIO_CODE, CHK_CYCLE, LAST_CHK_DATE, CHECER_NO, POWEROFF_CODE, TRANSFER_CODE, MR_SECT_NO, NOTE_TYPE_CODE, TMP_FLAG, TMP_DATE) values (#{consId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custQueryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tmpPayRelaNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgnConsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consSortCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{elecAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{elecTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractCap,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{runCap,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shiftNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lodeAttrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voltCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hecIndustryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{holiday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{psDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{notifyMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settleMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rrioCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chkCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastChkDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{checerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{poweroffCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transferCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mrSectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noteTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tmpFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tmpDate,jdbcType=DATE})

mapper.update:
update c_cons
CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONS_NO = #{consNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONS_NAME = #{consName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_QUERY_NO = #{custQueryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TMP_PAY_RELA_NO = #{tmpPayRelaNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGN_CONS_NO = #{orgnConsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONS_SORT_CODE = #{consSortCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ELEC_TYPE_CODE = #{elecTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_CAP = #{contractCap,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
RUN_CAP = #{runCap,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SHIFT_NO = #{shiftNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LODE_ATTR_CODE = #{lodeAttrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VOLT_CODE = #{voltCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEC_INDUSTRY_CODE = #{hecIndustryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOLIDAY = #{holiday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUILD_DATE = #{buildDate,jdbcType=DATE},
PS_DATE = #{psDate,jdbcType=DATE},
DUE_DATE = #{dueDate,jdbcType=DATE},
NOTIFY_MODE = #{notifyMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETTLE_MODE = #{settleMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_CODE = #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_NO = #{orgNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RRIO_CODE = #{rrioCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHK_CYCLE = #{chkCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_CHK_DATE = #{lastChkDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CHECER_NO = #{checerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POWEROFF_CODE = #{poweroffCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSFER_CODE = #{transferCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MR_SECT_NO = #{mrSectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE_TYPE_CODE = #{noteTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TMP_FLAG = #{tmpFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TMP_DATE = #{tmpDate,jdbcType=DATE},
where CONS_ID = #{consId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update c_cons set CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONS_NO = #{consNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONS_NAME = #{consName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_QUERY_NO = #{custQueryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TMP_PAY_RELA_NO = #{tmpPayRelaNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGN_CONS_NO = #{orgnConsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONS_SORT_CODE = #{consSortCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEC_ADDR = #{elecAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_CODE = #{tradeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEC_TYPE_CODE = #{elecTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACT_CAP = #{contractCap,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, RUN_CAP = #{runCap,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SHIFT_NO = #{shiftNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LODE_ATTR_CODE = #{lodeAttrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VOLT_CODE = #{voltCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HEC_INDUSTRY_CODE = #{hecIndustryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOLIDAY = #{holiday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUILD_DATE = #{buildDate,jdbcType=DATE}, PS_DATE = #{psDate,jdbcType=DATE}, DUE_DATE = #{dueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, NOTIFY_MODE = #{notifyMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SETTLE_MODE = #{settleMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CODE = #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_NO = #{orgNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RRIO_CODE = #{rrioCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHK_CYCLE = #{chkCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_CHK_DATE = #{lastChkDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CHECER_NO = #{checerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POWEROFF_CODE = #{poweroffCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSFER_CODE = #{transferCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MR_SECT_NO = #{mrSectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE_TYPE_CODE = #{noteTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TMP_FLAG = #{tmpFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TMP_DATE = #{tmpDate,jdbcType=DATE} where CONS_ID = #{consId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
